channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 03:31 Alarm lifted in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 03:31 Alarm lifted in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages. #Zhytomyr_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
